Одна из любимейших сюжетных линий!Игра огнище,доминируй унижай!

It's hard to describe what you'll experience while playing BioShock Infinite. The story is absolutely incredible; it's full of creative twists and told in clever ways. 

The basic mechanics—shooting, using abilities, etc.—are all inherited from previous BioShock titles, so they're just as good as always. To avoid repetition, Irrational changed up all of the Plasmids (now called "Vigors"), so some of them feel a bit out of place. The weapon system is also new, as you're forced to pick up and switch between a limited number of weapons at any one time instead of constantly having access to the entire arsenal. But this is offset by greater quantity of unique guns and a robust upgrading system.

The game is full of twists and turns and every level is something new and unique. And for the game designers, critics, and analysts, this game also has its fair share of political undertones, as with the previous BioShock games. Even if you're not into that, you'll still have a blast playing this game from start to finish.

Just to be clear, you absolutely don't need to play the first two BioShock games to get the complete experience out of this one. [i]However[/i], you should definitely play at least the original BioShock before playing the Burial at Sea DLC.

Best in the series, with surprisingly good gunplay and an even better story and setting.

Separated from this game now by a generation, and it's still as good as it was 9 years ago. The level of detail and overall graphic fidelity have of course aged since then, but the affect of the visuals and more importantly the experience has not. It's still a wonderful game that everyone should play.

真正的第九艺术品，好游戏

九小时主线通关一周目。
剧情真的是nice，玩到一半我就猜到了一半结局[spoiler] 我想留下当老婆的Elizabeth其实是我女儿 [/spoiler]，但另一半[spoiler] 大Boss Comstock其实是我自己 [/spoiler]完全没猜到。剧情的脑洞也很牛[spoiler] 平行世界，又是平行世界；量子力学，又是量子力学 [/spoiler]，结局也很惊艳（？）[spoiler] 就这么按水里捂死了呜呜呜呜呜；之前Booker杀Comstock的时候我还奇怪为什么是捂死在水里的，原来是后文有呼应 [/spoiler]。
玩法上，射击手感本身个人觉得还行，就是这个弹道和准头有点小奇怪；有Elizabeth这么个神仙队友真的爽，[spoiler] 血少了扔血包，蓝少了扔蓝药，没子弹了扔武器还是装好弹的，还会给你扔钱，还会提示你没注意到的开锁器和线索，死了还直接打个药就复活 [/spoiler]，绝了。
此外，我特别喜欢这种画风和这些场景，尤其是Colombia这种明亮的，带有宗教气息的“圣洁”的，而实际上是个反乌托邦需要被砸个稀巴烂的地方。
总而言之，爽到。不愧是当初被大呼“游戏是第九艺术”的代表作。
这游戏太棒了，尤其主角，胸大人美，截了好几张图了
流程不长，标准的时间系剧情，不过路上全程打枪，有时候会错过剧情，到结局才发现剧情快要完了。
不是游戏，是艺术，可能玩不懂，但剧情让人想哭

Overall, a fantastic, fun, and colorful linear first person shooter. Considering it came out in 2013, I think it still holds up pretty well. There are so many things to collect and explore that replaying the game to unlock all the achievements is a given, and why not? There are so many ways to play this game. First time through, I believe I was all about the machine gun and the carbine and crows. Second time, shotgun, sniper, volley gun, and the Ram vigor.

While not the most polished game ever made, it's still fantastic. If you're looking for a game that feels like a blockbuster action flick, this is a great (and affordable) pick.
The story isnt anything groundbreaking, but the gameplay is very fun and the graphics are nice. If you like killing NPCs with various guns and magic you will like this game.

不会真有人能拒绝伊丽莎白吧，纯纯完美人物。可爱清秀懵懂青春天真无邪，游戏中还会给伯克开锁或补充资源更会一手时空裂缝，话也很多，会娇嗔会吐槽会害羞，还是虚构人物，更完美了。游戏也不用多说，多少年前的游戏了，放在现在依然可以力压群芳，生化奇兵系列最好的一代，剧情丰富却也需要细细品酌，流程也不算长撑死五个点。战斗方面，多种技能多种枪支（虽然基本都用闪电）但仍可搭配不同战术应对不同战斗。虽然是线性流程，可地图对路痴来说也不算很友好，但是风景很好看，民风淳朴bu。只能说自己亲自玩了才懂，别人的感受终究不如自己亲身感受这绚丽多彩的生化奇兵
